text: Approval for the addition of three balloon sizes to the USCI(R) Apollo(TM) Rely(R) Over-the-Wire Balloon Dilatation Catheter with Hydro/Pel(R) Coating and Miniquet Device catheter line.  The device is indicated for balloon dilatation of the stenotic portion of a coronary artery or bypass graft stenosis for the purpose of improving myocardial perfusion.
